definition: to say/to tell/to announce/to report/to denounce/to file a lawsuit/to sue

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: The first trailer is out for the "Conan the Barbarian" reboot.
sentences.chinese: 第一個預告片是出於《野蠻人柯南》的重歸。

sentences.english: Watch the trailer in High Definition on Yahoo.
sentences.chinese: 雅虎上可以觀看高清版預告片。

sentences.english: Nintendo showed off a few trailers of 3-D movies such as How To Train Your Dragon on the 3DS.
sentences.chinese: 任天堂展示了《馴龍高手》等幾部3D影片的預告片。

sentences.english: A trailer of the episode could be seen after the break.
sentences.chinese: 而這個節目的預告片於文章的尾段可看到。

sentences.english: What is the song in the red-band trailer?
sentences.chinese: 電影預告片中使用的歌曲是什麼？

sentences.english: From the looks of the trailer, she won’t disappoint here.
sentences.chinese: 從預告片看，平託的表演是不會讓我們失望的。

sentences.english: Notice how the trailer even includes a nuclear explosion.
sentences.chinese: 注意預告片甚至還加上了一段核爆炸。

sentences.english: You can see the trailer here.
sentences.chinese: 點擊這裏，可以觀看預告片。

sentences.english: You’ll even get to see it before the midnight screenings on the east coast.
sentences.chinese: 甚至你會在東海岸午夜放映之前提前看到預告片。

sentences.english: I hadn't seen any previews, nor had I read any reviews.
sentences.chinese: 我既沒有看過電影預告片，也沒有讀過任何影評。

sentences.english: Do you want to see a Transformers 3 Trailer on this Featurette?
sentences.chinese: 你想在這個特輯看到一個變形金剛3預告片？

sentences.english: Then TV shows dedicated to showcasing previews hit the scene.
sentences.chinese: 然後電視節目才集中展示預告片。

sentences.english: You can watch the trailer in High Definition on Yahoo.
sentences.chinese: 雅虎高清頻道可下載此預告片。

sentences.english: Oh, and one more thing, that trailer you just saw?
sentences.chinese: 哦，還有一件事，看了剛纔那預告片嗎？

sentences.english: Check it out and tell me what you think in the comments below.
sentences.chinese: 看看這個預告片，然後告訴我你們對以下的看法。

sentences.english: Check out the new red-band trailer below.
sentences.chinese: 來一起看看下面新出爐的紅色地帶預告片吧。

definition: to begin shooting (a movie, a scene of a movie etc)/to start the bidding (auction)/to start a trading session (stock market)
to abridge (a text)/to edit out (of a movie)/to cut back (a budget, a curriculum)
dialogue (in a movie or a play)
photo taken during a theatrical production/a still (from a movie)
to learn sth over again/to review/to brush up/to revive (memories, friendship etc)
theatrical work (play, opera, TV series etc)/dramatic (change, increase etc)/acute/severe
